WorkItem.Description:
Attempting to publish a package and Wsus Package Publisher (latest version and prior revision both) is giving error: "Failed to sign package; error was: 2147942432"

Also noted that in the Information tab of a prior package the Folder field is highlighted in red as if the URL for the WSUS server can't be reached.  I was having an issue with another application that involved the IIS Manager yesterday, but to my best recollection, I didn't make changes to the WSUS portion.  Can someone shed some light on what error 2147942432 is?  Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: Failed to sign package; error was: 2147942432

Comments.Message: I contacted DCourtel via a private message and he responded that "usually this is due to a certificate issue.  Can you check that certificates are in the right places on the Wsus server and client."
Resolved this by temporarily disabling the Trend Micro anti-virus program.  Coincidentally, did not run into this issue with McAfee, only Trend Micro.
